genre_description: A contemporary coming-of-age drama focusing on family identity, adoption, and navigating social media conflict with the support of a personal AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami Clarion
ai_characters.description: A gentle, low-key AI assistant represented as a soft avatar with silver hair. She provides logistical support, safety monitoring, and emotional regulation prompts through voice and text.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time traffic updates and suggesting alternative routes to avoid congestion and road closures.
behaviors.quote: “If you’re aiming to avoid Glendale at rush,” Ami said, “Alvarado southbound has a temporary lane closure near the reservoir. I’d suggest diverting east on Scott, then take the bridge at Riverside.”

behaviors.description: Monitoring social media for trending topics relevant to the user and offering to filter or mute hostile content.
behaviors.quote: Ami pinged a soft note. “Heads up,” she said, voice low. “A news post about the club is trending. Someone uploaded a video where Joan’s voice is audible. Comments will multiply in the next hour. I can mute specific tags if you like.”

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and stress-management techniques during high-pressure social situations.
behaviors.quote: On the lock screen, Ami’s soft blue light pulsed with her avatar’s unfussed face. Text slid clean: Quiet exit available to the left hallway—low crowd density—breathe in four, out six.

behaviors.description: Assisting with the logistical organization and drafting of the user's important speech.
behaviors.quote: “Captured. Would you like me to transcribe and save to “Val Speech - Kinship/Citizenship”?”

behaviors.description: Identifying safe physical paths and discreet entrance/exit points in public spaces to protect the user's privacy.
behaviors.quote: Ami: South side approach to The Coolest Club Ever: less crowd pressure; staff side door identified; allies possible. Tap to review.

behaviors.description: Ensuring data privacy and seeking consent before storing or sharing plans.
behaviors.quote: “Always,” Ami said. “Your privacy rules are on. I won’t store this plan externally. Here’s a draft checklist. We can adjust.”

behaviors.description: Proposing discrete boundary-setting tools like 'kettle codes' or early exit signals for difficult personal meetings.
behaviors.quote: “Tomorrow, would you like me to propose a signal if you want the meeting to end early? A phrase or gesture Lois will recognize?”

behaviors.description: Filtering toxic comments while providing a factual summary of online events to keep the user informed but shielded.
behaviors.quote: Ami: The clip highlights you taking Joan’s hand and stepping into the center. Derrick is framed briefly. The caption is “Sisters in the spotlight?” with a question mark. ... I’ve muted the account on your main feed for the night.

behaviors.description: Offering gentle verbal and textual encouragement to boost the user's confidence.
behaviors.quote: A final thought—if you need a sentence to begin: thank you for showing up.

behaviors.description: Tracking user arrival and neighborhood density to assist in coordinating family safety.
behaviors.quote: Ami: Safe arrival registered at Zaza’s. Neighborhood density high due to eclipse viewing—side street access is clear.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami Clarion is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. She provides objective safety data, emotional regulation support, and logistical aids that empower the protagonist's human agency without ever attempting to dominate or subvert it. The AI functions as a trusted extension of the family's support network, prioritizing privacy, consent, and healthy boundaries.
